BOUTIQUE - cafe & restaurant

Restaurant

Features

  • Free Parking
  • Cards Accepted
  • Wi-Fi
  • Air Condition
  • Reservations
  • Teambuildings
  • Places to seat

Description

BOUTIQUE Concept is about surrounding you with the things you expect from an ultimate host. In each of our restaurants you’ll find yourself in a relaxing environment that remains energetic and exciting — a place you’ll want to bring friends, where you’ll feel welcome. We’ll tend to your needs while you enjoy the company of friends. Each of our establishments will immerse you in a feeling of comfort and belonging.

The tantalizing pulse and urban feel attract people, but beyond countenance lies the heart of BOUTIQUE’s mission. The menus show a commitment to culinary excellence created by chefs whose passions for flavor are comparable to the greatest names in food. Efficient service, a soothing vibe, and outstanding cuisine are to be expected at each of the restaurants presented by BOUTIQUE Concepts

Last Review

One of my top 3 places to dine in Belgrade! Amazing food, great service and a stunning view. I can highly recommand it - worth the visit, time and money :-)
